original_text: People who let their human thoughts rule them will die. But people who think about what God's Spirit wants will have life with God. They will have peace inside themselves.
korean_text: 육신의 생각은 사망이요 영의 생각은 생명과 평안이니라

sentences.original_text: People who let their human thoughts rule them
sentences.korean_translation: 자신의 인간적인 생각에 지배를 받도록 내버려두는 사람들은

sentences.original_text: But people who think about what God's Spirit wants
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님의 영이 원하시는 것에 대해 생각하는 사람들은

sentences.original_text: They will have peace inside themselves.
